title: Magnetic Island Resort Overlooking the Coral Sea with Onsite Restaurant & Two Pools
description: Succumb to the attraction of Queensland's Magnetic Island, staying in this harbourfront retreat, perfectly positioned to explore the island's national parks teeming with native wildlife and hiking trails. Dine on fresh seafood at the onsite Boardwalk Restaurant & Bar, or take a short stroll to the bustling Nelly Bay, brimming with eateries, and experience the magic of the Great Barrier Reef. Finally, relax by the two resort swimming pools and indulge in a lavish treatment at the onsite spa.
location_description: Peppers Blue on Blue Resort Magnetic Island
offer_address: 123 Sooning Street, Nelly Bay, Queensland 4819, Australia
